text: Rain is a 1932 American drama movie directed by Lewis Milestone and was based on the 1922 play of the same name and 1921 short story Miss Thompson by W. Somerset Maugham. It stars Joan Crawford, Walter Huston, Matt Moore, William Gargan, Walter Catlett, Guy Kibbee and was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1932 drama movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Lewis Milestone
title: Rain (1932 movie)
